content.query:
create or alter view rehandle
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/rehandle',
        data_source = 'mict',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [rehandle];

create or alter view tt_productivity
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/tt_productivity',
        data_source = 'vizingham',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [tt_productivity];

create or Alter view dual_cycling
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dual_cycling',
        data_source = 'vizingham',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dual_cycling];

create or alter view yard_che_productivity
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/yard_che_productivity',
        data_source = 'mict',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [yard_che_productivity];
